thread.section_title: Aussie Vac @ Ducted Vacuum Centre Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Aussie Vac @ Ducted Vacuum Centre | ductedvacuumcentre.com.au
thread.title: Desmond Lobo
thread.title_full: Aussie Vac @ Ducted Vacuum Centre reviewed by Desmond Lobo

author: Desmond Lobo
title: Desmond Lobo
text:
The service provided was excellent. I spoke to a person a few months ago who provided all the information I required and I was very happy with his responses.
I ordered two sets of vacuum inlet wall mountings and surrounding plates. The parts had the right code on them however the colour of the surrounding plate was ivory as compared to the white I had requested. The mounting inlet plates are white which I am happy with.
